top_comments.comment: Sorry I couldn’t make it earlier! Been busy with my job. So many customers this time of year, especially on Halloween.

comments_since_last_sample.body: For the rest of the terraforming wait until january and call it the antarctigon island until then for the christmas season.
I really love Ren's intros. There is always something new. And the moment he starts with "Greetings cyberdogs..." Oh! it has never failed to make me smile and feel excited for the episode.

Ren: Boatem VILLAGE
me: ...........?
#PayInTheBarrel
Rendog: I HAVE COME TO MAKE AN ANNOUNCEMENT

Is it possible to do something like Putting Huge Font Message directly on the Hermit's Screen.... similar to the Boogeyman thingy innLast Life. So whenever a Hermit enters the octagon or interacts with a particular item in the octagon... the message gets displayed on their screen.
#PayInTheBarrel

In other hermits shops: WE DONT ACCEPT DERPCOIN
Octagon: PAY IN THE BARREL
#PayInTheBarrel
It looks like dead snow
The octagon island kinda looks like it’s an apocalypse. Maybe cuz the green next to it
Love ya...thank you for giving me a smile and a chuckle each day

Create a wither cage directly under the Octagon, summon and name tag the Wither as "Pay in the barrels", then whenever you approach the Octagon, the Wither boss health bar will display as the message ;)
To be honest that background sound on the time lapse is the best dude. Love it and the salty white sand on the the octagon island looks amazing
You should put the signs on top of the boxes
A Hermitcraft episode always makes my day better

I think the best way to get hermits to pay in the barrel is to make the shulker box inaccessible until they pay. 😂 I’m sure Doc could redstone something up. That being said, the wraparound sign is *epic!!!*
Who is AriesEva? A camera account?
Sorry I couldn’t make it earlier! Been busy with my job. So many customers this time of year, especially on Halloween.
I've had a lot of stuff going on and I've been waiting to watch this for ages! I love this video <3
If one person accidentally place’s water on the concrete powder then it will turn into concrete.
